title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 340.10 - Names, addresses and telephone numbers of department officials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 340.10 - Names, addresses and telephone numbers of department officials

State Regulations

The names, business addresses, and telephone numbers of
the records access officer, and the appeals officer shall be made available to
any person requesting such information by telephone from the department's main
office or in writing addressed to the Department of Social Services, 40 North

Pearl Street, Albany, NY. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
340.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
